name: Fedora Fps
description:
Welcome to the beta version of the independent multiplayer shooter game Fedora FPS!
You'll join a lobby with other players and engage in combat using only an SMG in this frantic game. In order to avoid being eliminated yourself, your objective is to eliminate as many opponents as you can.

Players can currently only join one lobby because the game is still in beta. But don't worry, the action in this lobby never stops. You'll need to use your SMG and cunning to eliminate your opponents while preventing yourself from being eliminated.

Don't worry if you lose early in the game because you can respawn. You'll have the chance to rejoin the battle and fight until you're victorious
